article:
In America, the school day usually starts at 9a.m. and  _ at about 4 p.m. The school subjects are different from  _ . In China, we always have Chinese, maths, English, P.E. and so on. But in America, students have more lessons, such as  _  and driving lessons. Their school life isn't just about study. They have  _ things to do than the Chinese students do. There  _  many clubs in American schools, too. If the students are _ in sports, they can join different sports clubs. From 2:30 p.m.  _ 4 p.m., they do different things in different clubs.
Maybe you think English is very popular in the world,  _  American students don't need to learn any  other  language. But that's not true, American children from the age of seven  have to  learn a foreign language. For example, they learn French or Chinese.
